summary: Strange dwemer machinery that propels fire.
descriptionHtml:
=======DWEMER BUSTER=======

This is a new custom weapon I made based on the Dwemers\' technology.
Resembling a cannon, you can attach it to your hand and fire projectiles.
You can put it to either hand! It sure looks nice when duel wielded.

=======LOCATION=======

You can obtain it by doing a quest. To start it, go to the Silver Blood Inn and search the rooms. Go to the right and enter the first room. 
A Journal will be there. Read it, and it\'ll start the quest.

=======INFO=======

Perk: Destruction

Version 1.2: General Fixes.

Known Bugs:
-Third Person animation is bugged. Fix is on the works.
-Some clipping may occur with certain gauntlets in first person. Fix is also on the works.

=======CHANGELOG V 1.2=======

Added Quest Marker.
Modified Book text
Fixed some conflicted data
Removed grindstone improvement (not working right now)


=======FUTURE CHANGES=======

-Third Person and Clipping Fix
-Harder quest
-Implemented on the Dwemer Arsenal main quest

=======CREDITS=======

Credits to DONOTWANT from zeldacapital.com for the original model export and Nintendo for making such an awesome that is Zelda Twilight Princess!
author: KReeves
